description: R. Talsorian Games, in collaboration with CD Projekt Red, has announced that the new box set and starter kit for Cyberpunk RED, the Cyberpunk: Edgerunners Mission Kit, is now available for pre-order. This highly anticipated release serves as both a standalone product and a new starter kit for the popular tabletop RPG, Cyberpunk RED. The...
title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners Mission Kit Now Available for Pre-Order

description: Mantic Games has just announced their latest release: an expansive Firefight starter set that is being hailed as their best ever. This set, aimed at introducing players to the Warpath Universe, includes over 70 highly detailed hard plastic miniatures, a 224-page Command Protocols book, and various game-enhancing materials. The new starter set immerses players in...
title: Mantic Games Releases Comprehensive New Firefight Starter Set

description: Cryptozoic has released the Flashpoint Crossover Pack for the DC Deck-Building Game. Priced at $24.99, this expansion is now available on their website. The pack introduces players to the Flashpoint comic book series, allowing them to play as Super Heroes from an alternate reality. The Flashpoint Crossover Pack brings a new element to gameplay with...
title: Cryptozoic Releases Flashpoint Crossover Pack for DC Deck-Building Game
